metadata.title: CVE-2016-9861 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin. Due to the limitation in URLmatching, it was possible to bypass the URL white-list protection. All4.6.x versions (prior to 4.6.5), 4.4.x versions (prior to 4.4.15.9), and4.0.x versions (prior to 4.0.10.18) are affected.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
